title: Is it okay if I don't do Mtg NCERT at your fingertips? - Quora
tags: National Council of Educational Research and Training (NCERT)

response.answer_text: Doing objective is totally your wish. As per your strength on NCERT text book,after completing textual reading, practising MCQs is compulsory.Whatever the objective material it is , bit practising is important to crack NEET. Apart from that , MTG NCERT Finger tips is a very good book with great content and varied number of questions covering NCERT , so go through it after mastering NCERT.
